channel.title: Pages on Robert Vojta (𝒵𝓇𝓏𝓀𝒶)

item.title: Services
item.description: I’m Robert Vojta (also known as 𝒵𝓇𝓏𝓀𝒶). A developer with over two decades of professional software development experience. Don’t expect numerous articles on this site. I don’t write too much: it was already said elsewhere, it takes too much time to write something meaningful (like this post, for example). It doesn’t mean that I don’t write at all, just the frequency is very low. Hiring information I’m currently focused on the Ruby & Ruby on Rails development and the Rust language.
